poem:
Title: "The Misinformation Tango"

Nigel, Nigel, why obfuscate,
World's council assembles to peregrinate.
Pandemic treaty on their slate,
Global unity to create.
Sowing discord, reaping hate,
A treaty to collaborate -
Truth's your foe, lie your mate.
Nigel, Nigel, your misinformation does grate,
In our shared fate, participate, don't bait.
